## UFR Palaiseau seminars
* The UFR Mecanique organises external seminars on monday afternoons, stay tuned for the schedule. More info on [the seminar series website](https://polemecanique.github.io/UME-meca-seminars/).

##  Local seminars
* There a several seminars taking place within the Pôle Méca's building, the list of those seminars and info can be found [on the Pôle Meca's website](https://polemecanique.github.io/)

## Other seminars of interest

* Imaging in Paris: [https://imaging-in-paris.github.io](https://imaging-in-paris.github.io)
* Physics-Biology Interface Seminar: [http://www.lptms.universite-paris-saclay.fr/seminaires/semphysbio](http://www.lptms.universite-paris-saclay.fr/seminaires/semphysbio)
* Idefix seminar: [https://idefix.gitlabpages.inria.fr](https://idefix.gitlabpages.inria.fr)
* Labs within the île-de-France Region via the F2M [https://f2m.cnrs.fr/dans-les-laboratoires/seminaires-des-laboratoires/](https://f2m.cnrs.fr/dans-les-laboratoires/seminaires-des-laboratoires/).
